contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of July 2011, upon the motion of Appellant’s counsel seeking dismissal of the present post-conviction appeal due to Appellant’s death, it is hereby ordered that the collateral appeal is DISMISSED. The Application for Leave to File Post-Submission Communication in the Form of a Motion for Expedited Review is DENIED as moot.
Justice ORIE MELVIN did not participate in the consideration or disposition of this matter.
